about_the_game:
Myth Landers is a tactical role-playing game about the ruthless confrontation between heroes and terrifying monsters. It all takes place in a dark fantasy cyber world, where ancient cultures' wisdom and futuristic technological power combine. Manage a party of warriors from bygone times. Use reliable armor and advanced weapons. Choose and develop unique skills to strengthen your heroes. And start a campaign in one of the distinctive locations, where mutated offspring of the disgusting Aspid, cyber-jianshi, mummy-troopers, and other dangerous enemies.




FEATURES:

- Old-school pixel graphics in the style of ancient legendary consoles and dark synthwave music. Back to a few bits!
- Tactical turn-based fights similar to card battlers. Every move can be decisive!
- Building of a set of active combat movements and passive skills. Victory loves preparation!
- Gathering of amazing resources and crafting of powerful equipment. Can't level up the hero? Let them grow in breadth through equipment!
- Dialog-based quests that reveal the game world and character personalities. Talking is not waving fists!
- Ancient puzzles based on popular mini-games. Only the power of your mind can solve each one!




CONTENT:

- Unique heroes from the times of Ancient Slavs, Ancient China, Greece, and Egypt.
- A variety of different enemies with varying behaviors and skill sets.
- Over a dozen game locations created in the style of ancient cultures.
- Original pixel-art assets and soundtracks to enhance the game's atmosphere.


WHAT IT ISN'T:

- This is not an easy casual game. You will need to carefully study the abilities of your opponents, choose suitable heroes, and plan your turns in tactical battles. It's likely that you'll encounter situations where winning seems impossible and you'll have to try again. More than once you will be challenged. And more than once you enjoy the long-awaited well-deserved victory.

- This is not just about tactical combats. As you progress, you'll need to collect and trade resources, manage and develop your characters, craft equipment and consumables. Only then can you overcome the next obstacle and move forward.

- This is not an AAA-game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains unrealistic violence with the use of futuristic and high-tech weapons; pixelated organic and synthetic blood; corpses of defeated monsters.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL supported graphics card with 32 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL supported graphics card with 32 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card

short_description: A tactical turn-based RPG in a world of mythology and sci-fi. The player builds a deck of monster perks and then tries to defeat them. Lead a group of ancient heroes through hordes of evil monsters. Crush epic bosses to discover this world and become legends of the dark sci-fi future!
